moves.1. e4: The game will start very basic, the moves are the most common moves on the chess game database.
moves.2. Bc4: This is my usual game opening with white though I'm thinking of playing  1d4 some more because I'm not known to that opening.
moves.3. Nc3 Nc6 4. Nf3: This is pretty standard. Black could play Nxe4 here. The most standard move is Bc5 here. H6 is possible too.
moves.4... d6: This move isn't really standard, but it's not really that bad. However after Ng5 black should play d5, so this may be counted as losing a tempo.
moves.5. Ng5: Here I go trying to get some fun. d5 is pretty standard here but black had a surprising move that lost immediately.
moves.5... Ng4: This move looks ok, but it is not! Nxf7 looks good, probably Qf6 will follow and there will probably be some material loss for black. However there is a better move.
moves.6. Bxf7+: Bxf7+ this will go into a forced mate!
moves.6... Ke7: The player probably thought kd7 would lose the knight. However he is in a worse situation right now.
moves.7... Kd7: And so this will result in
moves.8. Qxg4#: checkmate in 8. I was happy I saw it.
